title: [OffTopic]How to maximize your CGPA from first year??
content: Barley been a week since classes have started. I'm feeling left behind by many of my peers. Especially in math. can any seniors tell me how to overcome this feeling. Some more random suggestions are really helpful like are slides enough or textbook are needed

comments.body: Your question or post has been answered previously. Before making a new post, always remember to search the subreddit. Duplicate posts will entail deletion.
